alert.note: Alert for North St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 22 at 4:03AM CDT until March 23 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...North St. Louis County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Bois Forte Band, Nett Lake area. * WHEN...Until 1 PM CDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and ice accumulation may break tree branches and cause power outages.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
